remarks: A utility theorem.  An interesting case is when the same formula is substituted for both ` ph ` and ` ps ` , since then both implications express a type of non-freeness.  See also ~ alimex .  (Contributed by BJ, 12-May-2019.)
statement: eximal $p |- ( ( E. x ph -> ps ) <-> ( -. ps -> A. x -. ph ) ) $.
